name: Diversey Holdings, Ltd.
description: Diversey Holdings, Ltd. is a global leader in providing cleaning and hygiene products and services aimed at enhancing the safety and well-being of people and the environment. Founded in 1923, the company has evolved into a key player in the hygiene and cleaning sectors, dedicated to delivering innovative solutions and products that meet the diverse needs of its customers across various industries, including healthcare, food service, and hospitality. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, Diversey focuses on developing environmentally friendly products and solutions that reduce the ecological impact of its operations while ensuring effective cleaning and sanitation. The company offers a wide range of products, including cleaning agents, disinfectants, and specialized equipment, as well as digital solutions that help optimize cleaning processes. Diversey’s mission is to create a cleaner, safer, and healthier environment for its customers and the communities they serve. The company operates in numerous countries, leveraging its extensive network to deliver quality services and products that adhere to the highest industry standards.
